Starting with a Pink Eye?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Monster Rancher DS: General QA: Starting with a Pink Eye?
By Mal'akh on Thursday, August 19, 2010 - 08:48 pm:

My friend wants to play MRDS, but insists that I
give her a way of starting off with a Pink Eye...
I don't know, she just likes the idea of a pink
Suezo... *shrug*

I told her the only way I know of getting a Pink
Eye at the start is to generate a Suezo-type and a
Pixie-type via the Magic Field, combining them to
make a Pink Eye, then just use the Encyclopedia to
get a book-level Pink Eye.

I'm not sure if you can get one via Incantation
since that's the one method I have been delinquent
in.

So the question is; does anyone have any idea how
a Pink Eye can be generated via Incantation?

By Mal'akh on Thursday, August 19, 2010 - 10:45 pm:

Sheesh. A few hours after I post the message above
and I answer my own question.

Method: Incantation
Word: Tecmo /Tek-MOW/

Depending on the pitch you will get Pink Eye, Baku,
or Marincho. Possibly some others, but my baritone
can only do so much.

By Lady Neptune on Friday, August 20, 2010 - 06:53 pm:

lol, well, also I tried "Sapphire" several times in the Incantation and consistently got a Pink Eye. But that may be specific to my voice.

By Mal'akh on Sunday, August 22, 2010 - 07:02 pm:

According to what I've read it's pitch-specific, but
it helps to have a word associated with the
Incantation so all you have to do is modulate the
pitch until you get the monster you want. =)

By marhawkman on Sunday, November 14, 2010 - 12:27 pm:

Evil experiments with creating multiple monsters and fusing them before raising can result in monsters that have impressive abilities(but not stats).
